SEARCH
Package com.poseidoncapitalsolutions.trading.controller

Class RuleNameController

java.lang.Object
com.poseidoncapitalsolutions.trading.controller.RuleNameController
@Controller public class RuleNameController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling operations related to RuleNames. Provides endpoints for viewing, adding, updating, and deleting rule names.

  • Method Details

    • home

      @GetMapping("/ruleName/list") public String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of all rule names.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to add the rule names to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the rule name list page.

    • addRuleForm

      @GetMapping("/ruleName/add") public String addRuleForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form to add a new rule name.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to add a new empty RuleNameDTO to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the rule name add form.

    • validate

      @PostMapping("/ruleName/validate") public String validate(@ModelAttribute("newRuleName") @Valid @Valid RuleNameDTO ruleName, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Validates and adds a new rule name.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - The new RuleNameDTO to be added.
      result - The result of validating the rule name.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the rule name list page if successful, or the form page if validation fails.

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/ruleName/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form to update an existing rule name.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the rule name to update.
      model - The model to add the existing rule name data to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the rule name update form.

    • updateRuleName

      @PostMapping("/ruleName/update/{id}") public String updateRuleName(@PathVariable("id") int id, @ModelAttribute("updatedRuleName") @Valid @Valid RuleNameDTO ruleName, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates an existing rule name.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the rule name to update.
      ruleName - The updated RuleNameDTO.
      result - The result of validating the updated rule name.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the rule name list page if successful, or the form page if validation fails.

    • deleteRuleName

      @GetMapping("/ruleName/delete/{id}") public String deleteRuleName(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Deletes a rule name by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the rule name to delete.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the rule name list page after deletion.
